channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump says he will order federal intervention in Chicago and Baltimore despite local opposition
item.description: President Donald Trump says he will direct federal law enforcement intervention to combat crime in Chicago and Baltimore, despite staunch opposition from state and local officials in both cities.

item.title: Judge rules Trump administration broke law in deploying National Guard soldiers to LA this summer
Final preparations for the trial of the man accused of attempting to assassinate Trump in Florida
